Title: FastCV_NET
Description: FastCV_NET is a .NET wrapper to the FastCV Computer Vision Library originally by QualComm. FastCV_NET allows easy Windows Phone 8 CV app development through C#.
HomeWiki:
FastCV_NET is a .NET wrapper to the FastCV Computer Vision Library by QualComm. FastCV_NET can be used to implement Computer Vision functionalities in Windows Phone 8 apps.

Why use us? FastCV_NET allows Computer Vision development in Windows Phone in C#, allowing users to develop computer vision implementations easily in Windows Phone 8 Apps.

Install Notes :

1. Be sure to get the latest update of Nuget Package Manager with Visual Studio 2013.
2. Go to the VIEW menu -> Other Windows -> Package Manager Console.
3. In the Package Manager Console type the following and press enter:

Install-Package FastCV_NET.winmd

4. Go to BUILD Menu -> Configuration Manager -> Set Configuration to Release and Platform to ARM. These are must.
